news.title: My wife and daughters left behind a legacy of love, John Hunt tells BBC
news.summary: The racing commentator, speaking for the first time since the murder of his wife and two daughters, says their love has helped sustain him through grief.

news.title: Watch: John and Amy Hunt's interview with BBC's Victoria Derbyshire
news.summary: BBC racing commentator John Hunt has spoken for the first time since the murder of his wife and two daughters, in July last year.

news.title: New test could identify women at higher risk of miscarriage
news.summary: The test can measure whether an abnormal reaction in the womb could make pregnancy loss more likely.

news.title: Touts employ overseas workers to bulk-buy gig tickets
news.summary: An undercover probe finds workers help touts make money from gigs including Oasis and Taylor Swift.

news.title: Gaza mediators intensifying ceasefire efforts, Hamas official says
news.summary: It comes as US President Donald Trump says "great progress" is being made since Israel and Iran ended their 12-day war.

news.title: Denis Villeneuve announced as director of new James Bond film
news.summary: The Oscar-nominated filmmaker says he is a "die-hard" Bond fan and will "honor the tradition" of the franchise.

news.title: Work begins to create artificial human DNA from scratch
news.summary: Scientists start a controversial project to create the building blocks of human life, in what is thought to be a world first.

news.title: 'A kind of magic': Emily Eavis on Glastonbury's Thursday feeling
news.summary: Before the music starts, an indescribable atmosphere descends on Glastonbury. Ros Atkins finds out more.

news.title: The Papers: Starmer 'in denial' and 'from Russia with shove'
news.summary: The rebellion against the prime minister's proposed welfare cuts grows and The Sun claims Russia is influencing small boat crossings.

news.title: 'I don't want to live on benefits, I want to work'
news.summary: Young disabled people may soon see their Universal Credit top-up cut as part of wider welfare reforms.
